cast.overview: After his life is turned upside down when his wife is killed in a London terrorist attack, a brilliant but introverted CIA decoder takes matters into his own hands when his supervisors refuse to take action.
cast.title: The Amateur

details.biography:
Presenter, Speaker, Former CNN and Bloomberg World Journalist, Russia & US Expert.

Award-winning correspondent and expert Ryan Chilcote worked for Bloomberg in London, covering stories from the oil market to Brexit, to the automotive industry. He is one of the leading experts on all things Russia and has 12 years of previous experience with CNN, having covered political and business news in Russia, the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and many others.
details.name: Ryan Chilcote
